charges.charge_description: 21:846 CONTROLLED SUB-SELL, DISTRIBUTE,OR DISPEN. Conspiracy to unlawfully possess with intent to distribute controlled substances, to wit: cocaine (Schedule II) and marijuana (Schedule I). (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced on Count 1 as follows: 60 months incarceration; 4 years supervised release (deft to submit to urine screens/drug treatment as directed by Probation Office); $50.00 special assessment. The Court recommends an Intensive Confinement Program for defendant when eligible. Deft to surrender for service of sentence at designated institution. (1)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) CONTROLLED SUB-SELL,DISTRIBUTE,OR DISPEN 18:2 Being aided and abetted, did attempt to possess with intent to distribute 1178 grams of cocaine, a Schedule II controlled substance. (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Counts 2 and 3 of indictment against DEREK E. CUNNINGHAM are DISMISSED. (2)

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) MARIHUANA-SELL, DISTRIBUTE,OR DISPENSE 18:2 Being aided and abetted, did attempt to possess with intent to distribute 3096 grams of marijuana, a Schedule I controlled substance. (3)

charges.charge_disposition: Counts 2 and 3 of indictment against DEREK E. CUNNINGHAM are DISMISSED. (3)
